divs: Sighting DetailsIn 2008, I was visited by several appearances of a Saturn-like UFO while I was living in Lacy Lakeview on 356 acres of land. The land sold so I had to move. I found a lovely space south west of the property near to a phenomena-haunted lake, Rainbow Lake. On Monday morning, I followed my pattern of taking Tiffany on a walk. It was 6 0 6 a.m. As I stepp'd out of my fenced yard, I look'd up at the sky and recognized Saturn, Venus and the Crescent Moon sitting between the two. As my eyes rested on the sliver of the moon, I saw a third orb appear right above the moon and drop straight down and then begin to wander off to the south east. The appearance was quick and didn't last long.
trends: There have been 16 other sightings in Waco
There were no other sightings in Waco on or around May 18th 2009
Summary: Saturn drop in front of the crescent Moon.
